EmailTemplate.description: Alert Proj lead when actual effort is >= 70% of planned efforts
EmailTemplate.name: Alert Project Lead on Actual Efforts on Project
EmailTemplate.subject: Project "{!01I90000000j8ZI.Name}" has reached 70% of planned efforts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!01I90000000j8ZI.00N90000004eU7A},
The project "{!01I90000000j8ZI.Name}" has reached more than 70% of the planned efforts. Please take necessary actions.
Planned efforts for the project: {!01I90000000j8ZI.00N90000004drZl}. Actual efforts reached: {!01I90000000j8ZI.00N90000004f3AX}/ {!01I90000000j8ZI.00N90000004draK}.
